creator: koegel@yahoo.com
text:
It would be very convenient to use native2ascii as part of a filterchain.
Two convenience methods <native2ascii/> and <ascii2native/> should be provided.

<copy todir="${out.src.dir}">
     <fileset dir="${src.dir}">
          <patternset refid="all.src.files"/>
     </fileset>
     <filterchain>
	<ascii2native/> 
	<replacetokens/>
     </filterchain> 
</copy>

<escapeunicode> has been added, it might get renamed later, but you should give it
a try with a nightly build of 2003-03-15 or later.
